reviewText:
The reason I bought this Playmate Review, because Barbara Moore, Tiffany Sloan, Morena Corwin  and Ashley Allen.

They have perfect bodies and pretty faces.

1st off most of these clips are NOT repeated on the video calendars unlike the prev. year which is good.  2nd this year includes some of my absolute favorite playmates.  Unfortunately, it also includes one of my least favorites ever.

Barbara Moore - great girl, cool 1st clip, 2nd still good.
Tanya Beyer - great girl, good enough clips.
Stephanie Adams - okay girl, 1st clip is cool.
Cady Cantrell - good girl, good enough clips.
Amanda Hope - okay girl, good enough clips.
Vicki/Anna Nicole Smith - can't stand her, I fastforwarded the clips.
Moreana Corwin - good girl, some decent shots but not great clips.
Ashley Allen - good girl, good clips.
Suzi Simpson - great girl, great breasts, cute clips.
Tylin John - good girl, okay clips.
Angela Melini - good girl, great breasts, good enough clips.
Tiffany Sloane - great girl, good enough clips.

Playboy / Playmate Review 1993 is 57 minutes long and was released on video on May 5, 1993. This is a review of all the Playmates in the year 1992. In general there was less nudity in this video then the 1992 video. Not one Playmate had full nudity in both her segments. It was full nudity in scene and partial, topless, or clothes on in the other segment. List below are the Playmates in the order that they appear.

Barbara Moore\Playmate of the Month for December 1992-Some nudity on the rocking horse and polo scenes
Tanya Beyer\Playmate of the Month for February 1992-Full nudity first half and second half she is nude 25% of the time
Stephanie Adams\Playmate of the Month for November 1992-Not nude first half, fully nude second half
Cody Cantrell\Playmate of the Month for April 1992-Mainly topless in the first half with a few quick seconds of full nudity. Mostly nude in second segment.
Amanda Hope\Playmate of the Month for July 1992-Segment one flips flops from being nude and not being nude. There is some nudity in segment two.
Vickie Smith\Playmate of the Month for March 1992 (1993 Playmate of the Year)-See breasts only in beach segment, nude in second segment, and nude most of the time in third segment.
Morena Corwin\Playmate of the Month for September 1992-She is 25% nude of the time in first segment and totally nude in the segment.
Ashley Allen\Playmate of the Month for August 1992-There is very little nudity in the first half and some nudity in the second half.
Suzi Simpson\Playmate of the Month for January 1992-No nudity in the first segment, nude in the second segment, and nude about 50% of the time in the third segment.
Tylyn John\Playmate of the Month for March 1992-Topless and completely nude at times in the first segment. No nudity in the motorcycle segment and very little nudity in the third segment.
Angela Melini\Playmate of the Month for June 1992-Clothes, then topless, and then nude in first segment; completely nude in the second segment.
Tiffany Sloan\Playmate of the Month for October 1992-Not nude in there first half and 35% of the time she is nude in the second half.

At times with the video I was sometime bored. Playboy / Playmate Review 1993 get a C-.
